item.title: üò∞ The case of the missing field ...
item.author: stationsolutions@gmail.com (rodrigo pinto)
item.description:
Its been a while, since I actually had to deal with on-premises SharePoint Farm … although im spent so many years with the platform, im still amazed on how you keep learning … with “legacy” systems. üòÅ

Recently, I’ve came across a strange behavior in a SharePoint 2016 farm : modified dates for sites, lists, libraries are more recent than expected when no updates were made by users …

item.description: Been in SharePoint world since 2003, and within community efforts since 2009, I was always keen to share knowledge, tips and tricks during presential sessions in conferences or usergroup meetings ...

item.title: About me
item.author: stationsolutions@gmail.com (rodrigo pinto)
item.description: The name is Rodrigo Pinto, I’m Enterprise Solution Architect with over than 20 years of experience and a Microsoft Office 365 Apps and Services MVP since 2011. Currently living near Lisbon, Portugal, im focused on architecture, development and technically leading teams in Microsoft 365 and Azure. Been blessed to live eXtraordinary times, meeting and mingle with full blown hearted people, I usually spent my free time with the wifey (she definitely ü§òüèª) & kids, coding, playing guitarüé∏, marvel comics (lots of them), movies, travelling and organizing community events.
